entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet watch not running on linux #23238
    7.0.1xx
  • CS8032 error in VS2019 if EnforceCodeStyleInBuild is set and .NET SDK 6 is installed #23261

Updated

  • Windows Update error 0x80070643 trying to install "2021-11 .NET 5.0.12 Update for x64 Client (KB5007884)" #23307
  • Define a platform-agnostic NET preprocessor symbol #22788
    Backlog
  • NETSDK1100 when building projects with multiple TargetFrameworks #23306

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo in CommonProperties.cs #23339
  • Build Single-File for Windows 7 (.NET 6) #23336
    Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542752 #23335
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542711 #23334
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542480 #23332
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542364 #23331
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542280 #23328
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow print rollback when non-admin. #23326
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542172 #23325
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add an option to run dotnet-watch in non-interactive mode #23309
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.1xx] bump the error number for CompressionInSingleFileRequiresSelfContained #22676
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1xx
  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI

Updated

  • Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23177
    Area-External, Area-SingleFile
  • Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ #23318
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add the same condition we have for net 6 to net 7 #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
